name: foodfast-drone-delivery
description: Food delivery system with drone management

scripts.install-all: cd client_app && npm install && cd ../restaurant_app && npm install && cd ../admin_app && npm install && cd ../drone_manage && npm install && cd ../server_app && npm install
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:client" "npm run dev:restaurant" "npm run dev:admin" "npm run dev:drone" "npm run dev:server"
